TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlNotificationType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the different notification types that can be received by an event handler through the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationType> enumeration is referenced by an instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationEventArgs> class. This information is provided when a notification event is fired with the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationType Change = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Data on the server being monitored changed. Use the item to determine the details of the change.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationType Subscribe = int32(1)

Docs.summary: There was a failure to create a notification subscription. Use the object's item to determine the cause of the failure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlNotificationType Unknown = int32(-1)

Docs.summary: Used when the type option sent by the server was not recognized by the client.
